verses.name: Jeremiah 4:20
verses.text: Destruction upon destruction is cried; for the whole land is spoiled: suddenly are my tents spoiled, and my curtains in a moment.

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:21
verses.text: How long shall I see the standard, and hear the sound of the trumpet?

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:22
verses.text: For my people is foolish, they have not known me; they are sottish children, and they have none understanding: they are wise to do evil, but to do good they have no knowledge.

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:23
verses.text: I beheld the earth, and, lo, it was without form, and void; and the heavens, and they had no light.
